bibl.title: Three Receipts from Soknopaiou Nesos.
bibl.note: 1. P. Lond. Inv. 1580a. Receipt for χειρωνάξιον γερδίων. 20 October 103 - 20 August 104. - 2. Inv. 1588a. Receipt for συντάξιμον and other taxes. 13 October 151 - 25 October 152. - 3. Inv. 1590a. Receipt for φόρος προβάτων. 14 June 199.
bibl.seg: Nikolaos Gonis, Three Receipts from Soknopaiou Nesos.

1. P. Lond. Inv. 1580a. Receipt for χειρωνάξιον γερδίων. 20 October 103 - 20 August 104. - 2. Inv. 1588a. Receipt for συντάξιμον and other taxes. 13 October 151 - 25 October 152. - 3. Inv. 1590a. Receipt for φόρος προβάτων. 14 June 199.
